definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

to lock (a door)/to close with a latch/to lock into place/a lock/a latch/to lock a computer file (to prevent it being overwritten)/to lock (denying access to a computer system or device or files, e.g. by password-protection)/to focus attention on/to target
locked in (with the door locked from the outside)

sentences.english: The last lane is Method, indicating where the lock contends.
sentences.chinese: 最後一列是方法，表明鎖競爭是在什麼位置發生的。

sentences.english: I bought another lock as an additional insurance against thieves.
sentences.chinese: 我又買了一把鎖，以加強防賊的安全措施。

sentences.english: Several different types of locks are available, some of them are listed below.
sentences.chinese: 鎖具有幾種不同的類型，下面列出了其中一些。

sentences.english: We could make thousands of locks a day in, uh, Yale & Towne.
sentences.chinese: 那時候在耶魯湯尼工廠，我們一天可以生產千把鎖。

sentences.english: Don't be discouraged, it's often the last key in the bunch that opens the lock.
sentences.chinese: 別灰心，往往是最後一把鑰匙才能打開鎖。

sentences.english: But the fish gate did the sons of Hassenaah build, who also laid the beams thereof, and set up the doors thereof, the locks thereof, and the bars thereof.
sentences.chinese: 哈西拿的子孫建立魚門，架橫樑，安門扇，和閂鎖。

sentences.english: Chinese website please use Chinese, lock, then delete.
sentences.chinese: 中文網站請使用中文，鎖，然後刪。

sentences.english: We want to tie in the MKO from the open mold side.
sentences.chinese: 客人希望從開模的方向鎖機器頂棍孔。

sentences.english: The lock took with a click.
In this scenario, a user retrieves data from the database with no locks.
sentences.chinese: 在此方案中，用戶從數據庫中檢索數據而不加任何鎖。

sentences.english: Each drawer was fitted with a lock.
sentences.chinese: 每個抽屜上都裝了一把鎖。

sentences.english: This technique is known as spin locking.
sentences.chinese: 這項技術就是所謂的自旋鎖。

sentences.english: Fingerprint verification could also add an extra layer of security when making mobile payments, for example.
sentences.chinese: 指紋驗證系統也給手機支付功能加上了一道保險鎖。

sentences.english: The referendum lock installed by the coalition is real;
sentences.chinese: 公投保險鎖真真正正的被聯合政府裝了上去。

sentences.english: It has freed the lock, closed the table, and is now trying to reopen it.
sentences.chinese: 先釋放鎖，關閉數據表，正嘗試重新打開數據表。

sentences.english: The Keyless Locking Mailbox turns the tables on mail thieves.
sentences.chinese: 不帶鑰匙的郵箱鎖改善了郵件失竊的情況。

definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
to fold/to fold over in layers/to furl/to layer/to pile up/to repeat/to duplicate
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
to link/to join/to connect/continuously/in succession/including/(used with 也[ye3], 都[dou1] etc) even/company (military)
to close/to stop up/to shut/to obstruct

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)
to stop/to cease/to dismiss/to suspend/to quit/to finish
double-edged sword/CL:口[kou3],把[ba3]/classifier for blows of a sword

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
to hang or suspend/to worry/public announcement/unresolved/baseless/without foundation
to lean against/to rely on/on the basis of/no matter (how, what etc)/proof
